sentences.english: It is research that is guaranteed to delight men - and infuriate the women in their lives.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究結果一定會讓男人高興，惹女人生氣。

sentences.english: Envy assails the hoblest, the winds howl around the highest peak……
sentences.chinese: 位高遭人妒，峯高惹風吹。

sentences.english: I always made you angry, do not be persuaded, of course, has now admitted the mistake was.
sentences.chinese: 我總是惹你生氣，還不聽勸，當然現在已經知錯了。

sentences.english: You will be extremely sentimental, and if pushed by others you may hold a lasting grudge.
sentences.chinese: 你會非常敏感，如果別人惹了你，你可能會記仇。

sentences.english: All because of something as tiny as a mosquito.
Spring is just wonderful world, Jalan poem several times before the wedding day.
sentences.chinese: 妙是人間春正好，佳期幾度惹詩才。

sentences.english: He is very quick-tempered, so no-one dares to offend him.
sentences.chinese: 他的脾氣很火爆，一般人不敢惹他。

sentences.english: The March wind is fretful, fretting the languid wave into murmurs .
sentences.chinese: 三月的風躁動不安，惹得倦怠的波浪嘩嘩作響。

sentences.english: 'I haven't offended you often by love-making?
sentences.chinese: 我向你求愛，並沒有常常故意惹你生氣啊？

sentences.english: Fathers do not embitter your children, or they will become discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 你們做父親的，不要惹兒女的氣，恐怕他們失了志氣。

sentences.english: Nine bead application of my vexatious rights to provoke nan peja trouble.
sentences.chinese: 九珠應用本人的無理取鬧權益惹楠佩費事。

sentences.english: Don't make him angry than you can help.
sentences.chinese: 儘量不要把他惹得發了脾氣。

sentences.english: We must forgive those about whom we are embittered.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須原諒那些惹我們生氣的人。

sentences.english: Fireflies fly everywhere on summer nights, which attract children to chase after them.
sentences.chinese: 夏日的夜晚，流螢飛舞，惹得孩子們爭着抓撲。

sentences.english: I remember you were upset by the ants.
sentences.chinese: 我猶有記憶你被紅蟻惹毛的樣子。

sentences.english: His temper's been changeable this week, so don't annoy him.
sentences.chinese: 這禮拜他脾氣變幻無常，所以不要惹他負氣。
